title: Create a way to report players in the client and not only after games!
body: You guys **REALLY** need to add a way to report people after you've exited the end of game screen, becuase sometimes you aren't able to access it after a game due to a bug or internet connection etc and sometimes people just forget and are too tilted to stop and report them. What I'm saying is add a button on the in-client match history screen to report players.

replies.body:
While post game reporting is still the best option wherever possible, in the event it isn't you can submit reports via Player Support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
